<h3 id="EuU_-quality-section-title-text" class="title">Flight quality</h3>

<div id="EuU_-quality-section-content" class="filterContent" role="region" aria-labelledby="EuU_-quality-section-title">

<div id="c_bi_" class="Flights-Results-FlightQueryAlerts">
<div class="container single">
<div class="icon">
<svg aria-hidden="true" class="icon-svg" width="16" height="20" viewBox="0 0 16 20" fill="none" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg"><path d="M7.98 0S3.99 2.927 0 2.927c0 6.878 0 13.756 7.98 16.702 7.986-2.927 7.986-9.805 7.986-16.702C11.976 2.927 7.98 0 7.98 0z" fill="#F4BD5D"></path><path d="M11.834 10.922l-3.83 3.771-3.828-3.78a2.625 2.625 0 0 1 0-3.756c1.053-1.025 2.653-.79 3.78.61l.049.058.049-.049c.936-1.41 2.731-1.649 3.78-.615a2.634 2.634 0 0 1 0 3.761z" fill="#DE3826"></path></svg>
</div>
<div class="warnings">
<div class="warning js-warning" data-code="CORONAVIRUS_BORDER">
<span class="header">COVID-19</span>
<div class="warning-msg">Hungary has restricted the entry to most foreign travelers starting from September 1, except Hungarian nationals, residents, military, diplomatic, humanitarian, transit flights and foreign nationals attending or participating in some sports events.</div>
<a class="js-link js-modal-trigger" href="javascript:void(0)" aria-label="Learn more">
Learn more
</a>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div id="c_bi_-query-alerts-dialog" class="Common-Widgets-Dialog-Dialog R9-Overlay a11y-focus-outlines extraRadius fromTop" role="alertdialog" tabindex="-1" data-dialog-owner="c_bi_" aria-modal="true">
<div id="c_bi_-query-alerts-dialog-focusStartBoundary" class="last-focusable off-screen" tabindex="0"></div>
<div id="c_bi_-query-alerts-dialog-modal" class="modalBackground">
</div>
<div id="c_bi_-query-alerts-dialog-viewport" class="viewport">
<div id="c_bi_-query-alerts-dialog-content" class="content ">
<button id="c_bi_-query-alerts-dialog-close" class="Button-No-Standard-Style close darkIcon " aria-label="Close">
<svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" viewBox="0 0 9.85 9.93" class="x-icon-x " aria-hidden="true"><use xlink:href="#-images-horizon-common-icon-x-icon"></use></svg> </button>
<div id="c_bi_-query-alerts-dialog-body" class="body">
<div class="Flights-Results-FlightQueryAlerts-dialog">
<b id="entryRestrictions">Entry restrictions</b><p>As of September 1, the Government of Hungary has reintroduced border protection measures in force during the first wave of COVID-19.
<br>
<br>
<br>Hungary has restricted flights to and from the UK from December 22.
<br>
<br>
<br>Hungary has restricted the entry to most foreign travelers starting from September 1, except Hungarian nationals, residents, military, diplomatic, humanitarian, transit flights and foreign nationals attending or participating in some sports events. Travelers with a residence permit issued by Hungary with validity for at least 90 days may enter Hungary.</p><b id="entryRequirements">Entry requirements</b><p>Foreign nationals may enter Hungary to attend international sporting or cultural events, but must leave within 72 hours of arrival. Travelers must present proof that the purpose of travel is to attend and international sporting or cultural event. Travelers arriving from Schengen Zone, the US or Canada must present two negative COVID-19 tests within 5 days of arrival but at least 48 hours apart. Travelers are subject to a temperature check on arrival but are not subject to quarantine measures.
<br>
<br>
<br>Foreign nationals arriving to Hungary for business and trade related purposes may enter the country without the need to show a negative test results, nor any time limit on their stay. On entry, travelers must present proof of an essential business requirement for entering Hungary, e.g. an official letter from your company that includes contact details for verification purposes, or an invitation to a business event. Travelers are subject to a temperature check on arrival but are not subject to quarantine measures.
<br>
<br>
<br>Travelers who are resident in Hungary, should carry proof of residence as well as their valid passport when they travel. </p><b id="quarantineRequirements">Quarantine requirements</b><p>Travelers are subject to medical screening and quarantine for 14 days.</p><b id="transitingRules">Transiting rules</b><p>Travelers transiting through Hungary must provide proof that entering the border is for the purpose of traveling directly to another destination outside Hungary; state the reason for travel and provide proof that they are able to transit to their final destination, for example a hotel reservation or proof of address in another country, a travel ticket, or similar evidence.</p>
</div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div id="c_bi_-query-alerts-dialog-focusEndBoundary" class="last-focusable off-screen" tabindex="0"></div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
</div>

<div class="js-sort-tab-row _iv9 _iaf _ixW _h-- _iaA _ioF _ilc _irG _iEz _ihx _iqB _icO _imy _ikr _iai">

<span class="js-label _itL _igh _ial _iai _iaj _kKW">
<span class="_iM-">
Best

</div>

<div class="row-desc">
<div>Dimensions: Up to 158cm total</div>

<div id="P_rf-top-target" class="_iSE _m8K"></div>
<h3 class="_ib4 _idG _iEz _ibc _ib3 _igh _iyc _ial _jhT _iaj _iaL">Flight details</h3>
<div id="P_rf-fl-det-sec" class="_id7 _irF _irG _ixV _ixW _kKc _iIe _iWT _ib9 _iKd _ihr _ihs _ihp _ihq _ioE">
<div id="P_rf-fl-det-legsum" class="_iaf _AD _h-Y _Yu _ilc _iai _kJU">
<div class="_igf _ioF _iai">
<div class="_idf _idG _ihM _iU4 _ibc _ia7 _kJZ _ia4 _id7 _kJW _kJX _kJY _ia- _ibH _igO">

<section class="category-selection full-width-section">
<div id="c_s-L" class="Flights-Results-DetailsFareSummaryPanels panels-modal-clear" aria-label="Fare options" tabindex="0">
<div id="c_s-L-scroll-panel-wrapper" class="scroll-panel-wrapper RADIO_BUTTON ">
<span id="c_s-L-category-radios" class="Common-Widgets-Radio-BlockComponentRadioButtonSet radioBtnSet--radio__layout flex-panels _iak" role="tablist" tabindex="0" aria-label="Fare options" aria-activedescendant="c_s-L-category-radios-oZec-fare-button-ECOFLEX-label">
<input class="r9-radiobuttonset hidden ${btn.inputClass} _iaL" id="c_s-L-category-radios-oZec-fare-button-ECOFLEX" name="c_s-L-rates-table-category" type="radio" value="ECOFLEX" aria-controls="oZec-ECOFLEX" checked="checked" aria-checked="true" aria-selected="true">
<div id="c_s-L-category-radios-blockComponent-0" class="Flights-Results-DetailsFareSummaryPanelBasic Flights-Results-DetailsFareSummaryRadioPanel ordered-presentation clear modal-presentation js-block-component-wrapper selected" aria-label="Flex, from ₪1,182. Fare Details: Includes: Carry-on bag, Includes: Checked bag, Includes: Seat selection, Available for purchase: Extra legroom, Includes: Changes">

<div id="KIgc-priceDisclaimers" class="disclaimerContent ">
<span class="daybase">Prices are per person and are for e–tickets and include all taxes &amp; fees in ₪.<br>We attempt to get accurate prices and fees; however, <a href="/help/noguarantee">prices and fees are not guaranteed, and may be subject to last minute changes over which we have no control</a>. Finally, some train and bus prices may not include a service fee added by the provider at checkout.</span>
<span class="total">Prices show the total for all passengers including all taxes and fees in ₪, and are specifically for e–tickets.<br>We attempt to get accurate prices and fees; however, <a href="/help/noguarantee">prices and fees are not guaranteed, and may be subject to last minute changes over which we have no control</a>. Finally, some train and bus prices may not include a service fee added by the provider at checkout.</span> </div>
</div>
<div id="KIgc-hackerFares" class="disclaimerText hidden">
¹Hacker Fares tickets are sold to/from a destination via different airlines and are subject to each airline's booking requirements and terms, including changes to itineraries. Any changes made to one of your tickets will not necessarily afford rights to change the other ticket. Fares change frequently and are subject to availability. International travel may require proof of return flight.

}
}

"useReactHeaderV2": true,
"isResponsivePage": false,
"allowContentMove": false});

msg: {

}
}, {"presentation":null,"isFD":false,"analyticsVertical":"flight","pageVertical":"flights","resultsPageComponentsMap":{"cars":{"analyticsVertical":"car","component":"cars\/results\/CarResultsPage"},"hotels":{"analyticsVertical":"hotel","component":"hotels\/results\/HotelResultsPage"},"flights":{"analyticsVertical":"flight","component":"flights\/results\/FlightResultsPage"}},"lazyLoadRP":false,"addClassDuringTransition":true,"staticViewportMetaTag":"width=device-width"});

} catch (e) { reportError("bufferedScripts", e); }
try { R9.events.ready("inlineComponents.initialized", "componentsReady"); } catch (e) { reportError("inlineComponents.initialized", e); }
if (R9.ajax._pendingPriorityRequests <= 0) {
try { R9.events.ready("ajaxComponent.highPriority.initialized"); } catch (e) { reportError("highPriority.initialized", e); }
}
try { R9.Analytics.api.trackPageView(); } catch (e) { reportError("trackPageView", e); }
});
window.R9 = window.R9 || {};
window.R9.init = window.R9.init || [];
window.R9.init.push(function(event) {
R9.Social.WebCredentials.tryAutoSignIn();
});
window.R9 = window.R9 || {};
window.R9.init = window.R9.init || [];
window.R9.init.push(function (event) {
try {
new R9.framework.body("CUjp", {"presentation":null,"extraClass":"en_IL react react-st a11y-focus-outlines wide","packageClass":"FlightsSearch","keelClass":"keel","localeClass":"en_IL","focusOutlinesActiveClass":"a11y-tab-navigation"});
} catch (e) {
if(window.R9Log) {
window.R9Log.error.apply(window.R9Log, ["framework", e])
} else {
window.console.error.apply(window.console, [e]);
}
}
});
function runInitWrapper(event) {
var initComplete = false;
window.addEventListener("load", function(e){
if (!initComplete) {
R9.events.when("page.initialized", function(){
var load;
try {
load = new Event('load');
} catch (IeDoesntSupportThis) {
load = document.createEvent('Event');
load.initEvent('load', false, false);
}
window.dispatchEvent(load);
})
}
}, true);
function runInit() {
var log = new R9.logger();
try {
log.time("init");
var deferred = document.querySelectorAll("link[data-rel='stylesheet']");
for (var i = 0; i < deferred.length; i++) {
var def = deferred[i];
def.setAttribute('rel','stylesheet');
def.setAttribute('href', def.getAttribute('data-href'));
}
if (R9 && R9.init) {
for(var i = 0; i < R9.init.length; i++) {
R9.init[i].call();
}
}
if (R9 && R9.devupdate) {
R9.devupdate.update();
}
initComplete = true;
} finally {
log.timeEnd("init");
}
try {
log.time("page.initialized");
R9.events.ready("page.initialized");
} finally {
log.timeEnd("page.initialized");
}
}
setTimeout(runInit, 20);
}
document.addEventListener("DOMContentLoaded", runInitWrapper);
</script>
